br.com.caelum.vraptor.core

Class DefaultReflectionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.core.DefaultReflectionProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReflectionProvider

    @ApplicationScoped
public class DefaultReflectionProvider
extends Object
implements ReflectionProvider
    Default implementation for ReflectionProvider that uses Mirror to access Java reflection features.
    Since:
    4.2
    Author:
    Ot√°vio Scherer Garcia

      • getMethod

        public Method getMethod(Class<?> clazz,
                        String methodName,
                        Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Description copied from interface: ReflectionProvider
        Returns the method by name with same signature as parameterTypes. The method will search in the class, and if not found, in the super classes. If the method is not found in any level, the null value will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getMethod in interface ReflectionProvider

      • invoke

                     Method method,
                     Object... args)

      • getField

        public Field getField(Class<?> clazz,
                      String fieldName)
        Description copied from interface: ReflectionProvider
        Returns the field by name. The field will search in the class, and if not found, in the super classes. If the field is not found in any level, the null value will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getField in interface ReflectionProvider
